sentences.sContent: The pizza will then take about twenty minutes to cook.
sentences.sCn: 接下来，比萨饼大约要用20分钟烤好。

sentences.sContent: Bye Mom, see you in a minute.

synos.tran: 分钟（minute的复数）；会议记录；备忘录

remMethod.val: 和minute(n. 片刻， 瞬间)一起记

trans.tranCn: 分钟（minute的复数）；会议记录；备忘录
trans.tranOther: A minute is one of the sixty parts that an hour is divided into. People often say "a minute" or "minutes" when they mean a short length of time.

trans.tranCn: 把…记录在案；为…测定时间（minute的单三形式）
